leadingComments.value:
*
         * @method
         * @public
         * @name setTicketWatch
         * @param {String, Number, Array} ticketID - selected TicketID or TicketIDs (array)
         * @param {Boolean} value - true to subscribe, false to unsubscribe
         * @description
         *   Sets ticket watch state.

*
         * @method
         * @private
         * @name setTicketWatchOnSuccess
         * @param {Object} response - the response object
         * @description
         *   Called/executed when watch operation run successfully.

*
         * @method
         * @private
         * @name setTicketWatchOnError
         * @param {Object} error - the error object
         * @description
         *   Called/executed when watch operation run fialed.

*

         * @public
         * @name setTicketWatch
         * @param {String, Number, Array} ticketID - selected TicketID or TicketIDs (array)
         * @param {Boolean} value - true to subscribe, false to unsubscribe
         * @description
         *   Sets ticket watch state.
Successful toast message should be shown only for bulk watch/unwatch.
%s tickets have been set to watch.
%s ticket has been set to watch.
%s tickets have been set to unwatch.
%s ticket has been set to unwatch.
System was unable to update ticket watch state.
Ticket watch state could not be updated. Please contact the administrator.
